## ARTHStore.state property

The current store state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get state(): ARTHStoreState<T>;
```

## Remarks

Should not be accessed before the store is loaded. Assign a function to [onLoaded](./arth-base.arthstore.onloaded.md) to get a callback when this happens.

See [ARTHStoreState](./arth-base.arthstorestate.md) for the list of properties returned.
